entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Periods of snow beginning late this evening. Snow over northern sections this evening. Local amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 6:38 PM MDT Sunday 2 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Periods of snow. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Local amount 5 cm. Wind becoming east 20 km/h in the afternoon. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 9. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 6:38 PM MDT Sunday 2 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 11. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries in the evening. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 7 in the evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 6:38 PM MDT Sunday 2 April 2023
